snippet.title: Risimon - Gameplay
snippet.description:
The Risimon Steam page is now online!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2471680/Risimon/
Add the game to your wishlist now to stay tuned and support us!
You can also join us on Discord to follow our progress.
https://discord.gg/upSeaZHTV6

Risimon is an adventure & monster-taming game combining an off-the-wall tone and a retro, yet restyled, aesthetic. Experience a hilarious journey across the Issou region. Catch Risimons, train them and fight to prove (to yourself!) that you are NOT a loser!
